name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blind and Unicolor Mod for online-go.com

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow you to play Unicolor and Blind go on ogs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension Allow you to play Unicolor and Blind go (only for your side).

For using this extension you should use the "Plain" stone type on OGS (the most left one with custom color)

You can switch mod with 3 grey buttons on the top right of the screen after changing the mod you should refresh the page and you can enjoy playing Blind or Unicolor Go!
